AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: wildborn ancestral Oni
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born and raised in a wild herd of [PAWN_possessive] kind. [PAWN_pronoun] had a slight preference over seeking vegetation for food.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: wildborn ancestral Oni
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born and raised in a wild herd of [PAWN_possessive] kind. [PAWN_pronoun] had a slight preference over interacting with other animals.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: wildborn ancestral Oni
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born and raised in a wild herd of [PAWN_possessive] kind. [PAWN_pronoun] was a lot more wild minded than the rest of the herd and resorting more to brute force.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: wildborn ancestral Oni
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born and raised in a wild herd of [PAWN_possessive] kind. [PAWN_pronoun] was more curious than the rest of the herd and would try a lot more different and varied activities.
